department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Request for Information for Intranet Package Solution
full_summary:
### Request for Information for Intranet Package Solution (IPS)
#### Tender Information
* **Reference Number**: WS4145892502
* **Amendment Number**: 5
* **Publication Date**: August 21, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date/Time**: September 19, 2023 at 14:00 EDT
* **Tender Status**: Expiré

#### Solicitation Details
* **Procurement Category**: SRV
* **Notice Type**: Request for Information
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Not applicable
* **Trade Agreements**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Contracting Entity
* **Department**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 
  11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage 
  Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Contact**: Smyth, Meghan (SPAC/PSPC) (elle-la / she-her)
  Email: [meghan.smyth@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:meghan.smyth@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Tender Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of Citizenship & Immigration (IRCC), is soliciting information regarding an Intranet Package Solution. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on September 19, 2023 by 14:00 EDT. Any bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will be declared non-responsive. 

#### Accessing Tender Documents
You can access the tender notice by visiting the Ariba Discovery page: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17182179?extsite=MTcxODIxNzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17182179?extsite=MTcxODIxNzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Note: I also updated the formatting, made the content more concise and fixed some English grammar mistakes. Also, I added a clear division of the notification into sections to make it easier to read. 

Let me know if you have any other questions or concerns! 1 CommentPosted by *pinkpixel* on August 24
